document.masterDocTitle: A review of the Neotropical genus Prionodera Chevrolat (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Eumolpinae) with description of a new genus

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of the Neotropical genus Prionodera Chevrolat (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Eumolpinae) with description of a new genus

subSubSection.paragraph:
Stenolampra Baly 1859 : 12
, new synonymy
Jodasia Bechyné 1951 : 350
, new synonymy

Type species.
Colaspis bicolor Olivier 1808 : 879
, designated by Monrós and Bechyné ( 1956 )

Prionodera
belongs to the informal group Endocephalites, as defined by Flowers ( 2003 a). It can be distinguished from other genera of the Endocephalites by the ventral tooth on the fore femur and, except for
P. cyanea
, by the more elongate body shape.
